variable.name: jboss_server_home
variable.description: Returns the server home for the server who's name matches the variable, or, if none, the runtime who's name matches the variable

variable.name: jboss_config
variable.description: Returns the configuration name for the server who's name matches the variable, or, if none, the runtime who's name matches the variable

variable.name: jboss_config_dir
variable.description: Returns the full path of the configuration folder for the server who's name matches the variable, or, if none, the runtime who's name matches the variable

variable.name: jboss_config_file
variable.description: Returns the full path of the configuration file for the server who's name matches the variable, or, if none, the runtime who's name matches the variable

subsystem.name: Suspended Deployment Scanner Filesystem Publish Controller

description.name: Local
description.description: A profile configured for use on a local machine.

description.name: Local (Use Management Operations)
description.description: A profile configured for use on a local machine, using management operations wherever possible.
